{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F7C027 |revision= |upc=722868842355 |asin=B00BB2MMNE;US; |price=49.99 |fcc_date=12/27/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WSMR-101 |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=home automation switch |fcc_id=K7SF7C027 |ic_id=3623A-F7C027 |pwr_v=120 |pwr_amp=15 |pwr_conn=NEMA 5-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350F;RT5350F, PBB9930409, 1123STA1; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835EMI-10G |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6I |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, test points,, (57600,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350F;RT5350F, PBB9930409, 1123STA1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=WeMo.XXX |default_ssid_regex=^WeMo.[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=EC:1A:59, B4:75:0E, |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wemo Switch Smart Plug}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.belkin.com/us/F7C027/p/P-F7C027}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Belkin|vs_id=01t80000002xFCbAAM}}
"WSMR-101 V01" and "ESK-P05-3801R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[http://openwrt.org/toh/belkin/f7c027 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Belkin+WeMo+Switch+Teardown/77953 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] *[http://www.edn.com/design/consumer/4440797/Teardown--WeMo-Switch-is-highly-integrated Teardown on '''EDN Network''']
